sentence.Network_en: The air - conditioning quit on us in mid - July.
sentence.Network_cn: 空调 居然在七月 中旬 撇下我们.

sentence.Network_en: Meteor shower begin in earnest in mid - July.
sentence.Network_cn: 流星雨真正开始是在七月中旬.

sentence.Network_en: In mid - July Brown's leave of absence ran out and he was forced to leave.
sentence.Network_cn: 到了7月中,布朗的假期又满了,他不得不离开这里.
